title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When selecting a file in the Navigator and choosing 'Open With' > 'Default Text Editor' option, nothing happens if the file is already open in a different type of editor. The scripted resource editor example, which ignores the XML file content, remains active instead of opening the file in a new editor.
EB: When selecting 'Open With' > 'Default Text Editor' option for a file that is already open in a different type of editor, the software should open the file in a new editor according to its type.
SR:
1. Create a new basic project.
2. Create a new file named 'test.xml'.
3. Select 'test.xml' in the Navigator.
4. Choose 'Open With' > 'Default Text Editor'.
5. Observe that nothing happens and the scripted resource editor example remains active.

Note: The software should consider the editor types when searching for an existing open file.
